title: Unit Settings
description: Settings that describe the behaviour and formatting of rewards corresponding to the configured unit or unit pattern

id.title: Reward Unit Settings Id
id.description: A unique identifier generated by combining reward type and unit or unit pattern (e.g. t/CREDIT/u/POINTS or t/CREDIT/u/CASH/*)

config.title: Unit Settings Configuration
config.description: Behaviour and formatting supported by this unit setting

rewardModifications.title: Reward Modifications
rewardModifications.description: The modifications supported by rewards applicable for this unit setting

isCancellable.title: Is Cancellable
isCancellable.description: Indicates whether rewards of this unit can be cancelled via SaaSquatch API/Portal

isRedeemable.title: Is Redeemable
isRedeemable.description: Indicates whether rewards of this unit can be redeemed via SaaSquatch API/Portal

isExpirable.title: Is Expirable
isExpirable.description: Indicates whether expiration is applicable to this reward of this unit
